channel.title: Ok so i made the website kinda but how would i add the pictures
channel.description: all i did was upload the index.html file there but now how do i get the pics to show this is my site i added the pics to my website already http://spartanrealm-com.webs.com/

item.title: Ok so i made the website kinda but how would i add the pictures
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Classic_, post:35, topic:431241”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=533918.msg3904844#msg3904844 date=1328137619]

What are you on about, you honestly are a fucking retard
[/quote] do you have a disorder of some sort because you just posted about my grammar dumb fuck

Hush child.

really? facepalm at one point or another you realize 3/4 of the people on this site want to make life harder for the people that need help. 1/4 of those people are just ignorant trolls who think they are funny. -.- serously get a life.

You must realize if someone as dumb as him cannot do this nobody can, so please stop trying to help him, trust me.[/quote]
Every single person was a noob at one point. some learn faster than others though. but, i like to give people a chance.

item.title: Ok so i made the website kinda but how would i add the pictures
item.dc:creator: @eDIT1 -eDIT-
item.description:
@eDIT1 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:18, topic:431241”][quote author=-eDIT- link=topic=533918.msg3904109#msg3904109 date=1328053553]

000webhost is better than webs plus u get cpanel and a lot more features than webs offers…

ok i got 000webhost or its the hosting24.com thing but how do i get access now it says i need to wait or something? i try to enter the cpanel or the edit site option but it does not allow me should i wait? i did get the email with my info…?
[/quote]

you will need an FTP (file transfer protocall) client. get FileZilla, then to connect to the host,you will need to type in the info for FTP that 000webhost gave you…btw the port is 21.[/quote]

will this still work even though i cant do anything for 24 hours the chat representative told me to wait 24 hours for the site to work…?

Read full topic
item.source: Ok so i made the website kinda but how would i add the pictures

item.title: Ok so i made the website kinda but how would i add the pictures
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote="-eDIT-, post:17, topic:431241"][quote author=xryz link=topic=533918.msg3904076#msg3904076 date=1328049912]
000webhost is better than webs plus u get cpanel and a lot more features than webs offers…
[/quote]

ok i got 000webhost or its the hosting24.com thing but how do i get access now it says i need to wait or something? i try to enter the cpanel or the edit site option but it does not allow me should i wait? i did get the email with my info…?[/quote]

you will need an FTP (file transfer protocall) client. get FileZilla, then to connect to the host,you will need to type in the info for FTP that 000webhost gave you…btw the port is 21.

Read full topic
